text: bottle at jans ... soft mellow open alcohol ... light pineappl nose ... big soft open alcohol ... mellow soft earthy rice.... soft gentle... fulll mellow and rounded
Bottle @ fonefan tasting. Clear as water. Aroma is sweet, rice and fruity. Flavor is quite sweet. Dry finish with alcohol. 180812
Bottle. Thanks Yngvar! Pours clear. The aroma is plain clean rice and light fruit. The flavour is quite alcoholic with notes of clean rice and some fruit.
Bottle. Clear colour with no head. Aroma is alcohol, rice, fruit, citrus. Flavour is alcohol, rice, citrus, fruit. OK sake.

750 ml bottle. Clear, pale straw and light oily body. Aroma is mainly rise and alcohol. Flavor is light citric fruity, a bit sweet and alcohol. Relatively plain, easy to drink, a bit too sweet and not to exiting.

Bottle 720ml.Crystia lclear colour with virtually none head. Aroma is moderate to light heavy rice, sweet rice, light alcohol. Flavour is moderate to light heavy sweet with a average duration. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is flat, finish feel is light alcoholic. [20110416]

Botle 75 cl. Courtesy of yngwie. Pours crystal clear with a vague tint of yellow. Sweet rice aroma with a warming alcohol. Medium body, very smooth mouthfeel, a little citrusy. Sweet alcohol finish. 160411
Bottle @ Ulfborg Easter Tasting, 2011. Pours water color no head. Nose is sweet. Rice and vanilla. A bit of alcohol. Not horrible. Warmth..

Bottle. A clear, almost colorless sake. Rice cooking water and alcohol dominates the aroma, with some fruityness. The flavor is a bit heavy on the alcohol and rice, but theres some fruityness too. Yellow apples and pears too. Warming and full-bodied. A bit too warming and ricey for my likings, but its far from bad eventhough. 110416

Bottle 750ml @ fonefan
Pours clear as water with no head. Aroma has notes of rice, alcohol and some fruits. Taste is medium sweet. Body is medium, texture is oily, carbonation is flat.
Bottle @ fonefan tasting. No head. Color is pale water. Aroma and taste are rice malt, alcohol and watery. Quite plain.
Bottle @ FOneFan. Clear very very pale with no head. Flavour is rice, sweet, alcohol and liquorice.
Bottle.Pours clear and slightly oily.Aroma of spent rice water, ripe apples and fruitiness.Flavor is sweet and fruity with some licorice and rice.
